item.title: About Andrie
item.description: Andrie de Vries is a data scientist, author and R programmer. Andrie is co-author of the book R for dummies, the book that helps everyone getting started with R, regardless of prior programming knowledge. He is also a regular contributor to the question and answer site StackOverflow. He is also a regular speaker at R and industry events, including: 2016 UseR!2016: Tutorial - Using R with Jupyter notebooks for reproducible research Machine Learning and Data Science conference, Bangalore 2016: Microsoft R Server & Applications: Comprehensive Overview 2015 EARL London, 2015: Reproducible Data Analysis with Revolution R Open (agenda) UseR!
